participants.name: Lauren Madden
participants.title: Mindset and Wellness Coach at Lauren Madden Coaching

messages.message: Same to you! How are things in your world? Happy New Year.
I would describe my world as unburdened. Thank you for asking! Happy New year. :) How are things as a recruiter at creative circle?

I like that description! Things are good on my end. I am celebrating my one year anniversary soon w/ this company. It's fun working with marketing and advertising people because it's what I went to school for + what I enjoy.
Good to do what you enjoy!
